ValidationRule.description: Issue Date can not be back dated. Only users in Accounts Profile and System Admin can backdate.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR (ISNEW(), ISCHANGED( DB_CR_Note_Date__c )), DB_CR_Note_Date__c < TODAY(),$Profile.Name <> "Accounts Profile" && $Profile.Name <> "System Admin")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Issue_Date can not be back dated.
